text: Can you help me open a bank account?
Sure. To open a bank account, I'll need your account number, password, and name.
My account number is 12345, my password is secret123, and my name is John Smith.
Alright. Let me create your bank account.
Thanks. Can you tell me the stock price for Amazon on March 10, 2022?
The stock price for Amazon on March 10, 2022 was $3023.6.
